backend/career-path.mo: Defines data types for career paths, user roles, learning resources, analytics, gamification, profiles, interviews, assessments, and job recommendations.
backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user profiles, job listings, applications, messaging, notifications, simulations, and integrations with storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected files, components, tests, and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides summaries of key frontend files describing their roles in authentication, dashboards, UI components, and data flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global styles, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Handles authentication flow, profile loading, conditional routing, and global providers for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActivityMo: Admin tab with layout and placeholders for real‑time activity logs and recent events.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAIIns: Admin analytics tab rendering mock AI insights with charts and timeframe selector; backend integration pending.
frontend/src/components/admin/Certificat: Admin UI for viewing, filtering, and managing certifications using placeholder data and actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/CompanyPag: Admin interface for reviewing, filtering, and moderating company pages with basic status controls and placeholder notice.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemAnal: Admin tab showing placeholder UI for upcoming system analytics and platform metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Admin tab containing placeholders for user directory and management features.
Implements an AI chat assistant with role-specific messages, quick actions, and interactive conversation logic using user profile data.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Analyt: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Candid: File contains no visible content in provided snippet.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Career: UI component that fetches and displays personalized career path recommendations and allows generating new ones.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Certif: Displays earned certifications and progress toward new ones using placeholder data.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Feedba: Empty placeholder file for a feedback view tab.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Growth: Shows candidate growth metrics, overall progress, and learning statistics from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobRec: Empty placeholder for job recommendations UI.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobSea: Job search interface with filters for experience, salary, and rating, displaying matched job results.
frontend/src/components/candidate/MyAppl: Empty placeholder for viewing a candidate’s job applications.
frontend/src/components/candidate/MyProf: Empty placeholder for profile management UI.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Resume: Loads resume analysis data and shows a notice that the feature is still under development.
frontend/src/components/candidate/SkillT: Empty placeholder for skill tests UI.
frontend/src/components/candidate/TakeTe: Empty placeholder for a modal used to take tests.
frontend/src/components/employer/AIInsig: Displays employer analytics with charts and mock AI insights about hiring performance.
frontend/src/components/employer/Applica: Empty placeholder for managing job applications.
frontend/src/components/employer/Assessm: Empty placeholder for employer assessments UI.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Component for searching, filtering, and displaying candidates with growth and career path summaries.
frontend/src/components/employer/Company: UI for creating and updating a company page, including logo and banner uploads.
frontend/src/components/employer/CreateA: Empty placeholder file for assessment creation modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/CreateJ: Empty placeholder file for job creation modal.
frontend/src/components/employer/EditInt: Empty placeholder file for editing interviews.
frontend/src/components/employer/EditJob: Empty placeholder file for editing job listings.
frontend/src/components/employer/Feedbac: Empty placeholder file for submitting or viewing candidate feedback.
frontend/src/components/employer/Intervi: Empty placeholder file for employer interview management tab.
frontend/src/components/employer/JobList: Empty placeholder file for employer job listings tab.
frontend/src/components/employer/Recomme: Empty placeholder file for candidate recommendations tab.
frontend/src/components/employer/Schedul: Empty placeholder file for scheduling interviews.
frontend/src/components/employer/TestRes: Empty placeholder file for displaying candidate test results.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, authentication controls, user profile info, theme switcher, and optional admin simulation button.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardTab.t: Shows a leaderboard with filtering, sorting, badge visuals, and highlights the current user’s ranking.
frontend/src/components/LearningHubTab.t: Provides a searchable and filterable list of learning resources with progress tracking and save/complete actions.
frontend/src/components/MessagesTab.tsx: Empty placeholder component for a messages tab.
frontend/src/components/NotificationDrop: Empty placeholder component for a notification dropdown.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCustomiza: Lets users update bio, contact info, and upload a profile picture with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial profile setup collecting name, email, and role before saving the user profile.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: Referral dashboard showing stats, referral list, and creation flow using query hooks; feature is mostly placeholder with UI elements.
frontend/src/components/SimulationMode.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the backend actor based on authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks and type definitions for fetching and mutating backend data related to jobs, candidates, and career progress.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for managing users, analytics, activity, company pages, AI insights, and certifications.
frontend/src/pages/CandidateDashboard.ts: Renders a tabbed candidate dashboard with sections for learning, growth tracking, career path, certifications, leaderboard, resume analysis, referrals, and profile customization.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboard.tsx: Provides a tabbed employer dashboard with learning resources, leaderboard, AI insights, branding, referrals, and profile customization.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the public landing page with hero content, featured companies, and feature highlights, using Internet Identity login and company page data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration that defines theming, OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current features, versions, and scope of the JobConnect platform.
